Welcome to our verification-centric community! We take safety and trust seriously. That's why everyone participating in our board community must go through a verification process—no exceptions. Once verified, you'll gain access to a range of features, including appointment requests, review writing, verification badges, ad posting, and messaging.

South West Board (SWB) takes pride in prioritizing the safety and quality of our community above all else. Our commitment to your security is unwavering, which is why we've chosen to maintain a private and exclusive environment. To be part of our thriving community, verification is a must. By doing so, we ensure a superior experience for all members. Join SWB, your trusted private adult community, where every member is verified, making it a secure and enriching space you'll be eager to be a part of.

To learn more about the verification process for both companions and admirers, please review our upgrade subscription options. At the core of our community is the commitment to safety, ensuring you can interact confidently and securely. Your well-being is our top priority.

Are you a gentleman tired of navigating through the screening process? We have a solution for you! Our board's Premium Membership offers an exclusive "Verified Check" status that can be proudly displayed on your profile. This Verified Check assures other members that you have been thoroughly verified by the SWB team, adding an extra layer of trust and security to your presence on our platform.

But that's not all. With your Verified status, you can also request references from female members within our community. These references will be prominently listed on your profile, further enhancing your credibility and safety within our community. This will provide companions with a unique link to view your SWB profile and reference information without the need for manual copying and pasting into emails or texts requesting for verification. Similiar to P411 OK's system.

Stay safe and verified in our trusted SWB community. Upgrade to Premium Membership today!

Joining our community offers a unique experience tailored to your needs. As a Premium member, you unlock unparalleled benefits:

1. Exclusive Content: Enjoy special access to "The Rest of the Story" (ROS) reviews, which remain hidden from guests, regular, and female members.

2. Engage in Private Discussions: Create and browse through "Private" posts in public forums, and immerse yourself in exclusive spaces like the Men's Lounge.

3. Enhanced Messaging: Say goodbye to the basic 50-message limit. With Premium, store up to 1,000 messages, neatly organizing them in custom folders.

Moreover, as a testament to your authenticity:

4. SWB Verified Badge: Your profile will feature an SWB badge, signifying our verification, reinforcing trust among members.

5. P411 Affiliation: If you're linked with the P411 site, we'll highlight this on your profile, making your membership evident to others.

6. Gather or solicit vouches/OKs from companions with whom you have had encounters.

7. Easily request a companion appointment through the SWB system without using an appointment request form.

8. Unlimited access to all listings.

9. On priority enquiry response.

To become a VIP hobbyist:

1. Payment: We exclusively transact in Bitcoin. Utilize the Cash App, scan our QR code, and complete your payment with ease. The rates are:

- 1 year: $100 this plan is valid for 1 year.

- 6 months: $65 this plan is valid for 6 months.

We DO NOT offer refunds in Bitcoin. We only accept Bitcoin payments. Please ensure you are using Bitcoin and nothing else.

Finally, becoming a member is a straightforward process that includes verification. To achieve verified status on SWB and access premium features, you must provide only one (1) of the following verifications along with a paid subscription. After verification, proceed to our upgrade section to initiate your payment.

1. Submit both your work and personal ID copies. You may choose to conceal or redact certain personal details, excluding your name and date of birth, while submitting both your work and personal ID copies.

OR

2. Share your LinkedIn profile or send a blank employment email from your work to Kathy at kathy@southwestboard.com. Both your email and Linkedln profile must match.

OR

3. Submit (2) references from a SWB verified companion or (2) references from a P411 verified companion. Companions are required to be currently engaged on the platform, and your meeting with the companion must have occurred within the last 3 months. They must verify you.

OR

4. Provide an active (paid) verifiable P411 ID for confirmation and submit the email address that corresponds to your P411 account.

While sharing IDs, redact any private details. We only need your name and date of birth. Prioritizing your privacy, our registration system is offshore, ensuring optimal data encryption. Once your payment is processed, your verification begins. We want to make it absolutely clear: we do not collect or retain your personal information. Once your verification process is complete, we promptly and securely delete all personal information offshore that you provided to us for verification purposes. Your privacy is our top priority.

Should you have any questions or require assistance with payment-related inquiries, please don't hesitate to contact Kathy at kathy@southwestboard.com. We're here to help and ensure a smooth experience for you. We're here to help and ensure a smooth experience for you.

Please submit all necessary documents or required information to Kathy. Kathy will verify your account within 24 - 48 hours. Once verified, proceed to our upgrade section to enhance your account. Kathy at kathy@southwestboard.com.

ONCE VERIFIED PURCHASE UPGRADES UNDER UPGRADE TAB.

**VIP Plan Monthly Subscription**:

- Ideal for highly active board members.
- 1-month subscription with each purchase.
- Publish 3 listings daily.
- Option to repost 10x daily.
- Enhanced photo storage capacity.
- Enhanced message storage.
- Price: $150/month.


**Standard Plan Monthly Subscription**:

- Great for those who plan to use the site multiple times weekly.
- Publish 1 listing daily.
- Option to repost 2x daily.
- Limited photo storage capacity.
- Limited message storage.
- Price: $100.


**Top 20 Companion VIP banner Monthly**:

This is an ultra high visibility plan for 1 month.

- Limited to 20 spots.
- Featured at the top of the SWB board.
- 30-day highlight period.
- One month validity.
- $250 per month.

**Top 10 Companion City banner Monthly**

- Limited to 10 spots.
- Listing in 1 city of your choice.
- Featured at the top of the city listing.
- One month validity.
- 30-day highlighted period.
- Price: $150 for 30 days.
Daily Ads limit reached. Please upgrade your account.
Ads not allowed. Please upgrade your account.
Access to this lounge is restricted to SWB Verified ladies' accounts only.
You can only do 1x repost in an hour, Please try again later...!

Your account will be DELETED and BANNED from SWB if your profile or ads include and of the following: Read Carefully.

Text describing your services MAY NOT BE sexually explicit. Be creative when making your ads or profile. You may NOT use text that directly or indirectly (including the use of slang GFE, FBSM, greek, intimacy or other “code” words or phrases that offers, references, solicits, or promises illegal and or sexual activity. You may not include explicit / nude photos. If you're uncertain whether your terminology is appropriate, consider whether it describes a sexual act. If it does, please remove it.No exceptions.

Please refrain from using fake images. We thoroughly inspect all images, conducting reverse Google image searches, checking Instagram, adult sites, etc. If a listing is discovered to be using fake images, the entire profile/account will be deleted from SWB.
Access to this lounge is restricted to SWB Verified mens’ accounts only.
Repost limit reached. Please upgrade your account.
Repost not allowed. Please upgrade your account.

Thank you for taking the time to provide your review! Your input helps keep our community informed and, in turn, safer.

Please note that discussing illegal activities, such as exchanging sex for money, drug use or sales, or any other potentially incriminating activities, is strictly prohibited. Additionally, reviews containing explicit nude photos, videos, or links are not allowed. Remember, our platform is for entertainment purposes only, so keep that in mind when writing your review and enjoy yourself!

When submitting your review, the "SWB Handle" field is crucial. Ensure you accurately input your provider's username, including any symbols or unusual spacing. This information helps identify the reviewed provider, adds your review to their profile, enables future vouching, and enhances searchability. Filling in more fields increases the visibility of your review.

We appreciate your cooperation and active participation on the SWB platform!
